ministry.name: Women's Bible Study
ministry.overview: The Women's Bible Study focuses on bringing the women of Calvary Austin together for worship, prayer and fellowship, with the ultimate goal to grow each woman in the knowledge of Godâ€™s Word.

long-description.p: Both morning and evening studies start Tuesday, Sep 17. The morning study will meet every week from 10-11:30AM and child care will be provided. The evening study will meet every other week from 7-9PM but with no childcare. Please sign up at the Events Center.
long-description.heading: Morning Bible Study
long-description.p: During the fall and spring, Women at Calvary offers a morning Bible Study. Studies usually include a time of worship, book overviews, study questions and prayer time. Babysitting as well as homeschooling classes are available on a cooperative basis, with anyone bringing children taking turns providing childcare. We have studied books by Nancy Missler, Jill Briscoe, Kay Arthur, Elizabeth George and Beth Moore. Last Spring, we did a study of the Proverbs, by Sandy MacIntosh. Currently we are studying the book of Colossians. We meet for fellowship from 9:30 to 10:00 and the Bible study begins at 10:00 and is over at 11:30.
long-description.heading: Evening Bible Study
long-description.p: Look for an evening study to begin soon. The evening study meets every other Tuesday night from 7:00-9:00 PM in the main auditorium. Childcare is not provided.
